meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of megakaryocytes.
meanings.sent1: The megakaryocytic process is essential for platelet production.
meanings.sent2: Her blood test showed an increase in megakaryocytic cells.
meanings.sent3: The megakaryocytic dance moves of the cell were quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: His leadership style was megakaryocytic, guiding the team with strength and precision.
meanings.sent5: The megakaryocytic nature of the storm brought a flurry of activity to the town.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or derived from megakaryocytes.
meanings.sent1: The megakaryocytic changes in the bone marrow were concerning.
meanings.sent2: The medication targeted the megakaryocytic pathways to improve clotting.
meanings.sent3: The megakaryocytic origins of the new treatment surprised the researchers.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was a reflection of the megakaryocytic inspiration she found in science.
meanings.sent5: The megakaryocytic connection between the two diseases was a breakthrough in research.
